name: AXI
description:
AXI

shoot to propel yourself in the void, shooting enemies to fuel your fire. dont let your fire go out, and don't die.

that's it, i'm not going to give you the controls or anything... just read the .read me.

oh yea and this was made for the Gamesfactory5 game jam

MAIN THEME: Inception

SECONDARY THEME: Water/Fire

TERTIARY THEME: Void

CONSTRAINT: Black and White

hope you enjoy!
